section.name: Custom locations
section.p: If the provided components (native compiler and/or source factory) do not support your location, you can create it on your own. You have to perform the following steps:

ol.li: implement biz.gabrys.lesscss.extended.compiler.source.LessSource which represents sources stored at the new location

implement biz.gabrys.lesscss.extended.compiler.source.ConcreteSourceFactory responsible for creating new instances of sources and add it to the biz.gabrys.lesscss.extended.compiler.source.SourceFactory

enable support of creation sources located at
the new location
local drives
in the source factory
use extended compiler which caching sources
use native compiler which supports sources located at local drives
